response.overview: A powerful documentary that follows the personal journeys of four individuals as they navigate the complex process of embracing and expressing their gender identity. Through intimate testimonies, the film reveals the emotional, social, and psychological challenges they face—from family rejection and societal prejudice to the realities of hormonal transition. Highlighting both pain and resilience, the documentary sheds light on the struggles of the trans community in a society still learning to accept them, and calls for greater understanding, respect, and inclusion.
response.title: DeTRANS de Mí
